function.name: AddItemDrop
function.DescriptionEN: Add the specified item drop to this creature
function.DescriptionCN: 为该生物添加特别的道具掉落

function.name: CreatureLevelUp
function.DescriptionEN: Level the creature up by the specified number of levels
function.DescriptionCN: 升级目标生物指定级别

function.name: SetArmorGain
function.DescriptionEN: Set the armor gained per level on this creature.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置该生物每级增加的护甲

function.name: SetAttackTimeGain
function.DescriptionEN: Set the attack time gained per level on this creature.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置该生物每级增加的攻击速度

function.name: SetBountyGain
function.DescriptionEN: Set the bounty gold gained per level on this creature.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置该生物每级增加的奖励金币

function.name: SetChampion
function.DescriptionEN: Flag this unit as a champion creature.
function.DescriptionCN: 将该生物标记为冠军生物

function.name: SetDamageGain
function.DescriptionEN: Set the damage gained per level on this creature.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置该生物每级增加的攻击伤害

function.name: SetDisableResistanceGain(
function.DescriptionEN: Set the disable resistance gained per level on this creature.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置该生物每级增加的控制抗性

function.name: SetHPGain
function.DescriptionEN: Set the hit point's gained per level on this creature.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置该生物每级增加的生命值

function.name: SetHPRegenGain
function.DescriptionEN: Set the hit point's regen gained per level on this creature.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置该生物每级增加的生命回复

function.name: SetMagicResistanceGain
function.DescriptionEN: Set the magic resistance gained per level on this creature.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置该生物每级增加的魔法抗性

function.name: SetManaGain
function.DescriptionEN: Set the mana point's gained per level on this creature.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置该生物每级增加的魔法值

function.name: SetManaRegenGain
function.DescriptionEN: Set the mana point's gained per level on this creature.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置该生物每级增加的魔法回复

function.name: SetMoveSpeedGain
function.DescriptionEN: Set the move speed gained per level on this creature.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置该生物每级增加的移动速度

function.name: SetXPGain
function.DescriptionEN: Set the xp reward gained per level on this creature.
function.DescriptionCN: 设置该生物每级增加的经验值
